phrs.translation: 苔藓动物类, 苔藓虫类

sentences.sentence: Pressing the glass to his eyelike a jeweler, Leeuwenhoek watched his own animalcules swim about, lashingtheir long tails.
sentences.translation: 列文虎克像珠宝商似地把放大镜按在眼睛上，观察自己的微生物甩动着长尾巴四处游动。

sentences.sentence: There were Volvox lookalikes, round balls of little creatures fused together to make a sphere of life rather than a separated quantity of what books like to call animalcules.
sentences.translation: 还有像团藻属类样子的东西，它们是小小的挤作一团的球状生物，而不是像书上所称的微生物那样各自分开。

sentences.sentence: Antonie van Leeuwenhoek, pioneering microscopist, observed in 1702 that dry sediments of "animalcules", expected to be dead, were brought back to life when exposed to rain water.
sentences.translation: 安东尼·范·列文虎克——使用显微镜的先驱，在1702年观测发现，把被认为死亡了的干枯的“微生物”沉积物放在雨水中时它们又复活了。
